title: Winter's Calling
description: Following the death of her father, Leah Monroe, a very lonely high school graduate from Moss Bluff, Louisiana, decides to attend college on the east coast; hoping to change everything about her life. Unfortunately, being a college student only helps make Leah's life more miserable. She starts to wonder if her life has any purpose at all. That is until she meets the hauntingly attractive Israel Drake who seems to always know where she is and what she needs. After a series of events one night, Leah soon realizes that Israel's presence isn't just a coincidence; it's supernatural. Now, she must decide if she is ready to accept the path destiny has chosen for her or find her own way.
author: Marcea Paige
